title: where can i find the wallpaper tool?
body: where can i find the wallpaper tool?

replies.body:
If you mean the wallpaper tool for your computer you can find it here: https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/league-displays

If you mean the wallpaper tool for your profile in client, find it where Morgana said :)
I'm assuming you mean the profile background? Right beside the summoner search on your profile page is a little settings icon, just tap that and you'll be able to change your background at will :^)
